name: inferno-overdrive--physical
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies depending on the original move.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies depending on the original move.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies depending on the original move.
